name: Virus Block_Er
description:
Do you have what it takes to stop the evil virus from taking over your computer? You only have 60 seconds to stop it before it all goes back to zero. Secure folders, solve riddles and defeat the virus!

Controls: Move by using WASD!

This game was created for the One Minute Jam by farsidevirtual.

Credits:

Idea & Design: Trebuflanik, Mark, Katharina, Lisa (Strangerer) Music & SFX: Dominik Art: Malii_mausii#8162 Programming & Project Lead: Lucas (BrightC)
